greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Row sums of ((1,x) + (x,x^2))^(-1)*((1,x)-(x,x^2))^(-1) (using Riordan array notation).
comment: Row sums of the matrix product A115358*A115361.
Generalized Ruler Function for k=4. - _Frank Ruskey_ and Chris Deugau (deugaucj(AT)uvic.ca)
a(n) is 1 + the 4-adic valuation of n+1. - _Joerg Arndt_, Oct 07 2015
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..16384
Joseph Rosenbaum, Elementary Problem E319, American Mathematical Monthly, volume 45, number 10, December 1938, pages 694-696. (The A indices in P at equations 1' and 2' for p=4.)
formula: G.f.: A(x) = Sum_k>=0} x^(4^k)/(1-x^(4^k)). - _Frank Ruskey_ and Chris Deugau (deugaucj(AT)uvic.ca)
a(n) = 1 + A235127(1+n). - _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 18 2017, after _Joerg Arndt_'s Oct 07 2015 comment.
mathematica: a[ n_] := If[ n < 0, 0, 1 + IntegerExponent[n + 1, 4]]; (* _Michael Somos_, Jul 19 2017 *)
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Jan 21 2006
